verses.text_plain: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.
verses.verse_html:
1Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered. ▼
▼ A Psalm…: or, A Psalm of David giving instruction

footnotes.body_text: ▼ A Psalm…: or, A Psalm of David giving instruction
footnotes.body_html: ▼ A Psalm…: or, A Psalm of David giving instruction

verses.text_plain: Blessed is the man unto whom the Lord imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.
verses.verse_html: 2Blessed is the man unto whom the Lord imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.

verses.text_plain: When I kept silence, my bones waxed old through my roaring all the day long.
verses.verse_html: 3When I kept silence, my bones waxed old through my roaring all the day long.

verses.text_plain: For day and night thy hand was heavy upon me: my moisture is turned into the drought of summer. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 4For day and night thy hand was heavy upon me: my moisture is turned into the drought of summer. Selah.

verses.text_plain: I acknowledged my sin unto thee, and mine iniquity have I not hid. I said, I will confess my transgressions unto the Lord; and thou forgavest the iniquity of my sin. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 5I acknowledged my sin unto thee, and mine iniquity have I not hid. I said, I will confess my transgressions unto the Lord; and thou forgavest the iniquity of my sin. Selah.

verses.text_plain: For this shall every one that is godly pray unto thee in a time when thou mayest be found: surely in the floods of great waters they shall not come nigh unto him.
verses.verse_html:
6For this shall every one that is godly pray unto thee in a time when thou mayest be found: surely in the floods of great waters they shall not come nigh unto him. ▼
▼ when…: Heb. of finding

tokens.text: For this shall every one that is godly

footnotes.body_html: ▼ when…: Heb. of finding

verses.text_plain: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 7Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.

verses.text_plain: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
verses.verse_html:
8I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye. ▼
▼ guide…: Heb. counsel thee, mine eye shall be upon thee

footnotes.body_text: ▼ guide…: Heb. counsel thee, mine eye shall be upon thee
footnotes.body_html: ▼ guide…: Heb. counsel thee, mine eye shall be upon thee

verses.text_plain: Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 9Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee.

tokens.text: Be ye not as the horse

verses.text_plain: Many sorrows shall be to the wicked: but he that trusteth in the Lord, mercy shall compass him about.
verses.verse_html: 10Many sorrows shall be to the wicked: but he that trusteth in the Lord, mercy shall compass him about.

verses.text_plain: Be glad in the Lord, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
verses.verse_html: 11Be glad in the Lord, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
